pages.text: This is an enchantment to 'mess' with players, Wardens and some more entities.

This enchantment summons three TNT per level and add the following effects to the Target: Resistance, to not kill them from the TNT; Glowing, to see them falling down from 3000+ Blocks; Slowness, Blindness, Darkness and Weakness to keep them in place. And instant Health, to give them temporary extra health, to stop them from dying to the explosion, if resistance doesn't work.
